name: Chaotic Dungeon
description:
GAME DOESN'T LOAD COREECTLY.

I will try to fix it after the jam ends, but for now you can't really play it in the browser. The only option would be to download the files and run them on a local server, but I understand thats a lot of hustle, so feel free to skip this one. 

2021 Brackeys Game Jam submission by Wojciech Kowalczyk.

- - - - -

Embrace the chaos and destroy as many enemies as you can in this chaoic "bullet-hell" (not really) game. THe longer you play, the more enemies spawn. 

If you're a pro gamer, you might just survive long enough to reach the BOSS FIGHT.

I hope you enjoy the game, Cheers!
